OHOS::Vector3< T >
==================

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Graphic <graphic.md>`__

**Description:**

Defines the 3-dimensional vector, and provides basic operators such as
[] and ==.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------

-----------------------
